lead_paragraph: Four Miami football players — including running back Tyrone Moss and receiver Ryan Moore, both starters — were suspended for the season opener Sept. 4 against Florida State because they violated team policy. Linebacker James Bryant and receiver Rashaun Jones were also suspended, Coach Larry Coker said yesterday.
